description:
Upward Mobility presents the first Palm webOS exam prep app for the VHMA's Certified Veterinary Practice Manager (CVPM) examination. This app contains 400 focused multiple choice questions, designed to cover all aspects of the CVPM exam, including human resources, law and ethics, marketing, organization of the vet practice, and finance.  Presented in an intuitive interface, the app can be used in a study mode, where each question is paired with with a detailed explanation of the answer, or a test mode where users can simulate the exam experience.  ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  This app was edited by Samantha Tanzer, Upward Mobility's Product Marketing Associate.  ||  About the CVPM:
"In 1989 the VHMA realized the increasing need among Veterinarians and Practice Managers for a program that would qualify the knowledge and experience necessary to successfully manage the ever-changing business management of today's veterinary practices. The Certified Veterinary Practice Manager (CVPM) certification is the result of that realization."  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
